HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"Syrian refugees lost family members. They don't blame Islam, they blame US. If we bring them then might as well give'm bomb making materials"
"#BlackLivesMatter is a domestic terrorist organization that advocates separate legal standards for blacks. Period. And It is a hate group."
"How u gonna accuse Mexicans of living off Americans and saying they're lazy when you then say they're taking all of the jobs..."
"\"Trannies were a mistake. They're nothing but trash.\" - @Pencoin"
"Black people have raped, robbed, assaulted and killed white people for DECADES. Is it any surprise they now want the right to resist arrest?"
"the reason money people get away with tax is they can afford good lawyers"
"#BlackOnCampus #IthacaCollege Blah, blah, blah give us stuff white ppl."
"Horrible scum thinking we are racist cos we know... @WHITEBRITON ARYAN LIFE LESSON 1 - WHITE IS RIGHT........FUCK you non white scum"
"@BrydensNotFunny that'd only because women talk too much."
"#Mizzou Nazi's haven't killed anyone since WWII yet a swastika = outrage. How about gang tags on campus? That's more indicative of violence."
